title: Inherent Anti-Fenton Property of Single-Atom Rhenium for Ultra-Durable Oxygen Reduction Reaction
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02375G, Paper
Xinzheng Yue, Yun-Ce Liu, Bangan Lu, Xin Du, Wen Lei, Zhongyi Liu, Sha-Sha Yi, Chao Lu
It is of utmost urgency to construct M-N-C catalysts with inherent stability and high performances towards oxygen reduction reaction (ORR). In principle, the 4d and 5d transition metals (TM4d,5d), particularly...
